American Guild of Organists, Ann Arbor Chapter records

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The record group was received from the organization (donor no. 10310) beginning in January 2010.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, American Guild of Organists, Ann Arbor Chapter records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Ann Arbor Chapter of the American Guild of Organists was established in 1969

scopecontent.p: Organizational archives, arranged chronologically, and including yearbooks, newsletters, board meeting notes, programs, clippings, and memorabilia; also photograph album commemorating 25th anniversary of the chapter; and scrapbook, 1969-1971, containing programs and clippings about chapter activities.
